Name: battery management system production, for Li-ion battery | battery management system, for Li-ion battery | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/272:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators/2720:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
Description: The battery management system is an electronic component in a lithium-ion battery. It includes battery module boards (BMB), the integrated battery interface system (IBIS) and fasteners, high voltage (HV) system, and low voltage system. BMB are placed under module lids, situated between two rows of busbars and their functions is to monitor the battery cells for voltage and temperature limits, whereas the IBIS acts as a master controller for the BMB.
